title: Apple launches its Self Service Repair program for select iPhone models
content:
Back in November 2021, Apple revealed that it would be allowing customers to repair some of their iDevices by themselves. The company promised that the program would launch in early 2022 for iPhone customers in the US. It would then support more devices and regions down the road. The wait is finally over, as the

The post Apple launches its Self Service Repair program for select iPhone models appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple has launched its Self Service Repair program in the United States, allowing customers to repair select iPhone models.
